subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Women
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. placed the Purdue women’s team on two years’ probation yesterday after it determined that Katrina Merriweather, a former assistant, wrote a paper for the former point guard Cherelle George and made more than 100 illegal recruiting calls. The women’s basketball program also will lose three scholarships, reducing the number for 2007-8 to 13 from 15. The program will not face a postseason ban.
